description: Details of the building envelope sound insulation pursuant to condition 9 of permission PP/2014/4595 dated 01/12/2014 for Demolition of existing garages and the construction of two three-storey apartment buildings containing 18 residential units (2 x 1-bedroom units and 16 x 2-bedroom units) and a part-two, part-three storey pair of semi-detached houses (2 x 4-bedroom units), the siting of three detached refuse stores within the landscaped courtyards of the neighbouring apartment buildings (at 1-28 Swan Road; 1-11 Whittle Close; 4-38 Wallis Road and 40-74 Wallis Road), associated landscaping and the re-arrangement of the adopted highway and on-street parking spaces in Lovell Road, Whittle Close and Swan Road (Deemed Consent)  (See planning ref: PP/2015/4098 for documents)
